quote: I am the only candidate who ran in either the Democratic or the Republican primary who said from the very beginning I will not raise taxes on the middle class.
quotePlain: I am the only candidate who ran in either the Democratic or the Republican primary who said from the very beginning I will not raise taxes on the middle class.
name: Hillary Clinton

checks.quote: Fifteen of the 17 Republican presidential candidates signed pledges not to raise taxes on anyone, which includes the middle class. Thirteen of those candidates signed the vow last year; the other two inked such a pledge earlier in their careers. Trump wasn’t one of them, but Clinton specifically mentioned the primary field. And that makes the claim both inaccurate and ridiculous.
checks.quotePlain: Fifteen of the 17 Republican presidential candidates signed pledges not to raise taxes on anyone, which includes the middle class. Thirteen of those candidates signed the vow last year; the other two inked such a pledge earlier in their careers. Trump wasn’t one of them, but Clinton specifically mentioned the primary field. And that makes the claim both inaccurate and ridiculous.

claims.title: Hillarly Clinton was the only candidate in 2016 who pledged not to raise taxes on the middle class
claims.negative: Hillarly Clinton wasn't the only candidate in 2016 who pledged not to raise taxes on the middle class
claims.negativePlain: Hillarly Clinton wasn’t the only candidate in 2016 who pledged not to raise taxes on the middle class
claims.truth: 15 of 17 Republican candidates pledged not to raise taxes on *anyone*, including the middle class.
claims.truthPlain: 15 of 17 Republican candidates pledged not to raise taxes on anyone, including the middle class.
